titleStmt.title: A true account of the passages at Mergen in the kingdom of Syam after Captain Anthony Weltden arrived at that port in the Curtana frigat, for account of the East India Company / humbly presented to the honourable the knights, citizens, and burgesses in Parliament assembled, by Samuel White.
titleStmt.author: White, Samuel, ca. 1650-1689.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
